thread.title: Watch the First Full Trailer For Jason Momoa's Bloody, Sexy Netflix Show
thread.title_full: Watch the First Full Trailer For Jason Momoa's Bloody, Sexy Netflix Show

author: Ryan Roschke
title: Watch the First Full Trailer For Jason Momoa's Bloody, Sexy Netflix Show
text:
Watch the First Full Trailer For Jason Momoa's Bloody, Sexy Netflix Show January 6, 2017 by Ryan Roschke 205 Shares 
We've spent the last handful of months obsessing over Jason Momoa's new Netflix show, Frontier . While we've managed to scrape together plenty of details about the show, it wasn't until this week that we got our first in-depth look at all the action ahead. Given the fact that Momoa's brimming with good looks and plenty of chest hair , it should come as no surprise that his Frontier persona is rugged and sexy and a little bit violent and scary. See for yourself in the trailer above. Related:
